item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Eddie Izzard
item.description: "What have you been reading, The Gospel according to St. Bastard?!" -- Eddie Izzard

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Dave Barry
item.description: "No matter what happens, somebody will find a way to take it too seriously." -- Dave Barry

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "If it’s true that our species is alone in the universe, then I’d have to say the universe aimed rather low and settled for very little." -- George Carlin

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by James Allen
item.description: "The visions you glorify in your mind, The ideals you enthrone in your heart.. This you will build your life by... This you will become." -- James Allen

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by H. Jackson Brown Jr.
item.description: "Twenty years from now you will be more disappointed by the things that you didn't do than by the ones you did do. So throw off the bowlines. Sail away from the safe harbor. Catch the trade winds in your sails. Explore. Dream. Discover." -- H. Jackson Brown Jr.

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "In a good bookroom you feel in some mysterious way that you are absorbing the wisdom contained in all the books through your skin, without even opening them." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by A.A. Milne
item.description: "If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you." -- A.A. Milne

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by George Burns
item.description: "Happiness is having a large, loving, caring, close-knit family in another city." -- George Burns

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Bruce Springsteen
item.description: "Someday we'll look back on this and it will all seem funny." -- Bruce Springsteen

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "Look, I really don't want to wax philosophic, but I will say that if you're alive, you've got to flap your arms and legs, you got to jump around a lot, you got to make a lot of noise, because life is the very opposite of death. And therefore, as I see it, if you're quiet, you're not living. You've got to be noisy, or at least your thoughts should be noisy, colorful and lively." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Mel Brooks
item.description: "I've been accused of vulgarity. I say that's bullshit." -- Mel Brooks

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Chaunine add a quote by Eckhart Tolle
item.description: "Some changes look negative on the surface but you will soon realize that space is being created in your life for something new to emerge." -- Eckhart Tolle
